name: FierDragon
description: $FierDragon, the flaming mythical beast that symbolizes prosperity and good luck is now on Blockchain! With its deployment on Binance Smart Chain (BSC) and launch onto PancakeSwap, $FierDragon offers a path to an enchanted financial journey. The token boasts a total supply of 21,000,000, giving its holders access to the expansive BSC network. But the excitement doesn't stop there! Along with the token, $FierDragon has issued a limited number of 120 unique NFTs, making them highly sought-after digital collectibles. These NFTs embody the spirit of $FierDragon, offering exclusive opportunities for their owners in the $FierDragon universe.
